short_summary: Regional Master Standing Offer for the procurement of fresh eggs on an as and when requested basis
description: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), Atlantic Region, on behalf of various government departments has a requirement for a Regional Master Standing Offer for the supply, delivery and offloading of various quantities of fresh eggs on an “as and when requested basis” for the period of the Standing Offer, broken down into 2 periods. Bidders may bid on any period of their choice. “,
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
### EC095-230008: Regional Master Standing Offer for the Supply of Fresh Eggs

#### Tender Details
* **Tender Reference Number**: WS3930684043-Doc3966504213
* **Amendment Number**: 1
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3930684043
* **Publication Date**: May 3, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: October 17, 2023, at 14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: May 1, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: April 30, 2024

#### Tender Description
Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) requires a Regional Master Standing Offer for the supply, delivery, and offloading of various quantities of fresh eggs. The contract will be executed in two periods, and bidders may choose to bid on one or both periods.

#### Tender Information
* **Goods or Services**: Eggs and egg substitutes (UNSPSC Code: *50131600)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest price
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Delivery Regions
The contract will cover the following delivery regions:
* Canada
* Newfoundland and Labrador
* Nova Scotia
* New Brunswick

#### Contact Information
For more information, please contact:
* Andrew MacFarlane, SPAC/PSPC
* Email: [andrew.macfarlane@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:andrew.macfarlane@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Please visit the notice URL for more details: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16018536?extsite=MTYwMTg1MzZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16018536?extsite=MTYwMTg1MzZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

#### Tender Status
The tender is expired. For similar opportunities, please consult the Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) website.
